description: Table of resultants for cyclotomic polynomials phi_k(x) and phi_n(x).
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=1..100 of triangle, flattened
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cyclotomic Polynomial.
mathematica: Flatten[Table[Resultant[Cyclotomic[n, x], Cyclotomic[k, x], x], {k, 20}, {n, k}]]
